name: ブラッディ クロニクルズオリジナル・サウンドトラック【Bloody Chronicles OST】
detailed_description:
We present Bloody Chronicles Original Soundtrack that begins with the openings created by Sara Matsumoto (Riverside)
26 musical pieces created by two Japanese composers Nishiki Haruka & Andy Hiroyuki, which blend in perfectly with the world of Bloody Chronicles

01. Konton no Umi@`Shisu wa Ikari ka Tamashii ka 【Full Version 】
Theme Song: Konton no Umi@`Shisu wa Ikari ka Tamashii ka`
Vocal: Sara Matsumoto (Riverside)
Lyrics/Composed: Cororo (Riverside)
Guitar: Snowman (Riverside)
02. Konton no Umi@`Shisu wa Ikari ka Tamashii ka 【Nomas】
03. Konton no Umi@`Shisu wa Ikari ka Tamashii ka 【Game Version 】
04. Squad
05. Black Coffee
06. Bright moon
07. Rendezvous
08. Yukidoke
09. Junction
10. Lovely Smile
11. Tea Time
12. Daily Stroll
13. Cat's Tail
14. Sweet Potato
15. Sunny Day
16. Speakeasy
17. My Understanding Secretary
18. Detective Tradition
19. Search
20. Crisis
21. Riot
22. Trick
23. Abyss
24. Creeping Shadow
25. Sign of Death
26. Avenge
27. Hidamari
28. Yokaze
29. To Each Road

short_description: We present Bloody Chronicles Original Soundtrack that begins with the openings created by Sara Matsumoto (Riverside) 26 musical pieces created by two Japanese composers Nishiki Haruka & Andy Hiroyuki, which blend in perfectly with the world of Bloody Chronicles

fullgame.name: Bloody Chronicles - New Cycle of Death Visual Novel

supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • Sound Card: Wersja 9.0

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Any 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
